## Load Libraries 

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
```

## Load Data set

```{r}
camera <-read.csv("GDE Wildlife Camera Trap Image Processing  - DATA.csv")
```

## Analysis 

```{r}
#Summarize count of each bird species found at each site
cameracount <- camera %>%
  group_by('Location Code', Species) %>%
  summarise(Count = n()) %>%
  ungroup()
```

## **Trap RAI**

Calculate RAI

RAI = \# occurrences/# days in operation

```{r}
TrapRAI <- bird
count |> 
  mutate(RAI = Count/2)
```
